trends: There have been 20 other sightings in Savannah
There were no other sightings in Savannah on or around May 10th 2013
divs: sighting detailsoutside looking in an east direction towards i 95 noticed a glowing white\gold like disc\spear shape craft with a large circle, like a large orb beneath the craft. the orb appear to be spinning in a counter-clockwise direction and with a blue\grey color haze around the orb. as the craft came closer in view the larger orb under the craft was releasing smaller white glowing orbs. after approx. 2 minutes - 1 and 1\2 minute, i lost slight of the craft after it went behind tree line. no sound, steady glowing light very bright, white to white\gold color.
